xwikidoc.content: <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 00:50 <ravigarg27> has quit 04:05 <ravigarg27> has quit 08:22 <sdumitriu> has quit 08:24 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 08:57 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 09:29 <ravigarg27> has quit 10:05 <krinye> has quit 10:09 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 10:14 <lakhanpandya> has quit 10:19 <ravigarg27> has quit 10:19 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 10:25 <sdumitriu1> has quit 10:27 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 12:27 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 12:59 <BogdanVancea> has quit 13:29 <ravigarg27> has quit 13:40 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 13:41 <BogdanVancea> has quit 14:01 <ravigarg27> has quit 14:11 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 14:11 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: Cant reproduce the bug 14:20 <BogdanVancea_> has quit 14:50 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: there ? 14:56 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: Help with the bug 14:56 <kushalkhandelwal> can reproduce it 14:57 <sdumitriu1> Hold on a bit 15:08 <kushalkhandelwal> Help me with the bug once you are done with this :) 15:14 <BogdanVancea> has quit 15:22 <sdumitriu1> kushalkhandelwal: My bad, it's Alt+Shift+S 15:30 <kushalkhandelwal> I can't see the error in firebug 15:31 <sdumitriu1> kushalkhandelwal: You have to enable "Break on all errors" to see it 15:31 <sdumitriu1> To do that 15:31 <sdumitriu1> In the Console tab 15:32 <sdumitriu1> At the bar with "Clear Persist Profile" buttons 15:32 <sdumitriu1> At the left end there's a Pause button 15:32 <sdumitriu1> Click it so that it's pulsating 15:32 <sdumitriu1> Refresh the page, press the key shortcut 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh I did that in the native devleoper tool 15:33 <kushalkhandelwal> Wait will try 15:34 <kushalkhandelwal> It didn't output anything 15:36 <kushalkhandelwal> Now can see that 15:52 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok too many problems with ff in linux 15:52 <kushalkhandelwal> finally firebug is working fine 15:52 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: 15:53 <kushalkhandelwal> I think I found one issue 15:53 <kushalkhandelwal> in the same page 15:53 <kushalkhandelwal> database page 15:53 <kushalkhandelwal> Patient template and Patient Class 15:54 <kushalkhandelwal> auto suggest doesn't work 15:54 <kushalkhandelwal> And 15:55 <kushalkhandelwal> ajaxSuggest used here is depriciated 15:55 <kushalkhandelwal> XWiki.widgets.suggest should be used 15:56 <sdumitriu1> Yes, I know about the suggest 15:56 <sdumitriu1> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9106 15:57 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 15:58 <kushalkhandelwal> So why to keep it 15:58 <kushalkhandelwal> its better to remove it 15:58 <sdumitriu1> I agree 16:09 <kushalkhandelwal> It would be defined in which page ? 16:09 <kushalkhandelwal> Webpreference / 16:09 <kushalkhandelwal> ? 16:11 <sdumitriu1> No, the class 16:12 <kushalkhandelwal> Class ? 16:12 <kushalkhandelwal> suggested class ? 16:12 <sdumitriu1> No 16:12 <sdumitriu1> The configuration class 16:12 <sdumitriu1> You have to find it 16:13 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 16:29 <sdumitriu1> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Administration+Application#HMakingyourapplicationeasilyconfigurablewithConfigurableClass28SinceEnterprise2.3M129 might help 16:32 <kushalkhandelwal> I was looking in DBConfigurationclass 16:32 <sdumitriu1> Yes, that's the right one 16:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok 16:32 <kushalkhandelwal> I was looking at the right thing 16:32 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 16:33 <kushalkhandelwal> From where is the suggest coming I have to look that 16:33 <kushalkhandelwal> I was actually looking from where 16:33 <kushalkhandelwal> onfocus="new ajaxSuggest( 16:33 <kushalkhandelwal> this is appended to the form 16:33 <sdumitriu1> That comes from deep inside XWiki 16:34 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 16:34 <sdumitriu1> It's much simpler to turn it off than you think 16:34 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 16:34 <kushalkhandelwal> Let me try 16:35 <sdumitriu1> You're using ?editor=class in the URL, right? 16:35 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 16:35 <kushalkhandelwal> spacedadmin 16:37 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh i was not using that 16:37 <kushalkhandelwal> I was looking in the xml file 16:39 <kushalkhandelwal> I can see use suggest 16:39 <kushalkhandelwal> looking for it in xml 16:41 <kushalkhandelwal> Okay 16:41 <kushalkhandelwal> I guess I found it 16:41 <kushalkhandelwal> I have to set picker to 0 16:41 <kushalkhandelwal> for patientclass 16:41 <kushalkhandelwal> and patienttemplate 16:41 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: That should do ? 16:44 <sdumitriu1> Hold on 16:44 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh ok 16:52 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: ? 16:55 <BogdanVancea> has quit 17:01 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: There ? 17:02 <sdumitriu1> Now yes 17:02 <kushalkhandelwal> Is that ok ? 17:02 <kushalkhandelwal> changing picker in the file 17:02 <kushalkhandelwal> to 0 17:02 <kushalkhandelwal> for Patient Class Template and Phenotype Mapping 17:02 <sdumitriu1> Yes 17:04 <kushalkhandelwal> PR sent 17:05 <sdumitriu1> kushalkhandelwal: I don't see the changes in the template 17:06 <kushalkhandelwal> 3 changes 17:07 <kushalkhandelwal> In patient class 17:07 <kushalkhandelwal> patient template 17:07 <kushalkhandelwal> and mapping 17:07 <sdumitriu1> Oh, I see 17:07 <sdumitriu1> I mean changes in DBWebHomeTemplate 17:07 <sdumitriu1> Since that one also uses the class 17:09 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 17:09 <kushalkhandelwal> didn't see that 17:10 <kushalkhandelwal> Where this file is used ? 17:11 <sdumitriu1> Rarely 17:11 <sdumitriu1> It's used when creating a different set of patients, in a different space 17:11 <sdumitriu1> Right now we only use the "data" space 17:11 <sdumitriu1> But you can create more 17:12 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 17:13 <kushalkhandelwal> Is it being used currently ? 17:13 <sdumitriu1> Nope 17:13 <kushalkhandelwal> Should I change in the same branch ? 17:14 <kushalkhandelwal> Pushed in the same branch 17:16 <sdumitriu1> Yes 17:16 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok :) 17:17 <kushalkhandelwal> One more thing 17:17 <kushalkhandelwal> I wanted to do 17:17 <kushalkhandelwal> in this Database Configuration Page 17:17 <kushalkhandelwal> For every group 17:17 <kushalkhandelwal> in form 17:17 <kushalkhandelwal> like Patient information: 17:17 <kushalkhandelwal> Meta Information 17:18 <kushalkhandelwal> we cann add 17:18 <kushalkhandelwal> Selet All | Clear All | Reset 17:18 <kushalkhandelwal> When I was looking at #429 17:18 <kushalkhandelwal> It got irritating to select all livetable columns 17:18 <kushalkhandelwal> So I was thinking of it 17:19 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh this reminds me I have to try 429 also 17:19 <kushalkhandelwal> What do you say ? Should we add it 17:19 <kushalkhandelwal> Few lines of JS should do it I guess 17:20 <sdumitriu1> Not sure it's worth it now 17:20 <sdumitriu1> Few people will have to actually use them 17:20 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 17:21 <kushalkhandelwal> Let's say in Mandatory fields I want to make 25 out of say 40 mandatory 17:21 <kushalkhandelwal> Currently none are selected 17:21 <kushalkhandelwal> then it gets difficult to select 25 17:21 <kushalkhandelwal> Although it might not be used a lot 17:21 <sdumitriu1> Yes 17:22 <sdumitriu1> But "Select all" won't help 17:22 <kushalkhandelwal> Deselecting 5 is better than selecting 25 :D 17:23 <kushalkhandelwal> Random thoughts of mine 17:23 <kushalkhandelwal> It wont be that useful 17:23 <kushalkhandelwal> Will try 429 and 442 soon 17:23 <kushalkhandelwal> 2 more exams to go :D 17:24 <sdumitriu1> Feel free to try and implement that 17:24 <sdumitriu1> It would be a useful feature, but not important enough 17:24 <sdumitriu1> So, if you're bored, you can do it 17:24 <kushalkhandelwal> :D 17:24 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok 17:25 <kushalkhandelwal> For now I would sleep 17:25 <kushalkhandelwal> its 3 17:25 <kushalkhandelwal> Good night :) 17:25 <kushalkhandelwal> Bye 17:26 <kushalkhandelwal> is now known as <kushal> 17:27 <kushal> is now known as <kushal|Away> 17:37 <kushal|Away> has quit 17:39 <kushalk124> has quit 18:16 <sdumitriu1> has quit 19:03 <sdumitriu> has quit 20:07 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips
